item.title: Adrianna add a quote by Josephine Hart
item.description: "For why trap what is already trapped? It is only in flight that we know the freedom of the bird" -- Josephine Hart

item.title: Adrianna add a quote by Josephine Hart
item.description: "Memory is never pure. And recollection is always coloured by the life lived since" -- Josephine Hart

item.title: Adrianna add a quote by Marisa de los Santos
item.description: "There’s a kind of holiness to love, requited or not, and those people who don’t receive it with gratitude are arrogant beyond saving." -- Marisa de los Santos

item.title: Adrianna add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "It seems to me now that the plain state of being human is dramatic enough for anyone; you don't need to be a heroin addict or a performance poet to experience extremity. You just have to love someone." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Adrianna add a quote by Marisa de los Santos
item.description: "Sometimes, happiness feels so fragile…So what do we do about it?...Live. Forget that it’s fragile. Live like it isn’t" -- Marisa de los Santos

item.title: Adrianna add a quote by Jonathan Tropper
item.description: "I totally remember what it felt like to be so full…Full of promise, full of dreams, full of shit. Mostly just full of yourself. So full you’re bursting. And then you get out into the world, and people empty you out, little by little, like air from a balloon…You try like hell to fill yourself up with fresh air, from you and from other people. But back then…it was so damn effortless to feel full, you know? All you had to do was breathe" -- Jonathan Tropper

item.title: Adrianna add a quote by Jonathan Tropper
item.description: "What it must feel like, I thought, to look at something, anything really, and know that it’s for the last time?" -- Jonathan Tropper

item.title: Adrianna add a quote by Maurice Sendak
item.description: "I'll eat you up I love you so." -- Maurice Sendak
